articles.author: Edward Segarra, USA TODAY
articles.title: Valerie Bertinelli's 'Valerie's Home Cooking' to end after 14 seasons - USA TODAY
articles.description: Valerie Bertinelli, host of Food Network’s "Valerie's Home Cooking," revealed that the show is being canceled after 14 seasons on Instagram Saturday.
articles.content:
Valerie Bertinelliis blowing a chef’s kiss to her beloved cooking show.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor final trailer teases Cal’s trip to Coruscant - Polygon
articles.description: At Star Wars Celebration 2023, EA and Respawn revealed the final gameplay trailer for Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, showing Cal Kestis in full-on Jedi Knight action.
articles.content: He also throws a Stormtrooper into a TIE Fighter
